name: Frog and Toad
description: This game was made using Bitsy for Nicholas O'Brien's Fall 2021 Game Design I class. It is an adaptation of the short story "Cookies" from the classic children's book, Frog and Toad Together. In it, you play as Toad, and your goal is to try and find all of the cookies that Frog hid. After all, although you agreed not to eat any more, you can still climb the shelf, cut the strings, and open the boxes!
